"Hilda": "It's time. Air support, prepare to engage the enemy."
"I-I have an urgent report! Scanners are showing two large hostile readings inside the Themis!"
"Oh no! One of our fighter planes was hit! It's going down! This is terrible!"
"Calm down, Melitta. All ARKS members in the vicinity of F-5: assist the damaged fighter plane."
"Remaining fighter planes, regroup and continue the search-and-destroy operation. Don't let the other hostile get away."
